name: łan
description:
Cellular automata based city builder game, where you have to join pieces together and discover interactions between them, while trying to manage resources  in tight space.

  • WASD/arrow keys to move
  • Q/spacebar to move to next day (can't be done during building)
  • escape, skip tutorial, cancel building
  • 1, 2, 0 to pick from available buildings.
  • M to mute
